SELECT P_CODE, OCODE, P_NAME,P_PRICE, P_CONTENT, P_IMG, DATA FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM,N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PINFO ORDER BY DATA DESC) N) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BRAND_LIKE WHERE BRAND_NO = #{BRAND_NO} AND USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
